title: Friend Hover DOESN'T WORK AGAIN!!!!
body: When i put my mouse on my friend the status no longer shows again. It happened and about a week ago it was fixed now its back!!! Please fix this asap!!!!!!

replies.body: Fun fact: the League of Legends Client wasn't developned by any Rioter, it just spawned as a bug and they decided to make it up as if it was them.

I get that people like to trash on riot's client and all but why does this really even matter? It's not like it gives any critical information it just gives the full blurb, rank, masteries, and whatever champion they're playing the most. The blurb doesn't really matter, and you can check rank, masteries and recent champ by going to their profile page.

obviously it matters, its a quality of life thing that's always been there, suddenly its gone without explanation. Having to click on their name and selecting view profile takes more time obviously than hovering. Think about it logically before asking if it matters.
